    • Method Detail

      • getFiles

        public static java.util.List<java.io.File> getFiles(java.lang.String path,
                                                    java.lang.String ext)
                                             throws java.io.IOException
        This method explores the file system and identifies files with a certain extension.
        Parameters:
        path - The URI of the directory to explore.
        ext - The extension to consider.
        Returns:
        The list of files corresponding to the good extension.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs when opening the directory

      • getFiles

        private static java.util.List<java.io.File> getFiles(java.net.URI uri,
                                                     java.lang.String ext)
                                              throws java.io.IOException
        This method explores the file system and identifies files with a certain extension.
        Parameters:
        uri - The URI of the file to explore.
        ext - The extension to consider.
        Returns:
        The list of files corresponding to the good extension.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs when opening the directory
